definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: set, place (B Aram. Hithpa. Targum [[שְׁוׇא]] Pa. set, make (oft. Targum = [[שׁום]], [[שׁית]]); Thes al. sub I. ´[[שׁ]]:, orig. set, place, then set together, compare, < weakened fr. orig. make even, right, cf. Vulg. Ar. saway II. make (Wahrm, cf. also Ba:ES 66));—Pf. 1 S. [[שִׁוִּיתִי]] Ps 16:8 I have set ´[[י]]: before me ([[לְנֶגְּדִּי]]); [[עֵזֶר עַל]] ´[[שׁ]]: Ps 89:20 I have placed strength upon a hero, cf. Ps 21:6; Pt. [[מְשַׁוֶּח רַנְלַי כְּ]] 2Sa 22:34 setting my feet like hinds = Ps 18:34 (cf. Targum [[שַׁוִּי בְּ]] Ge 48:20, Je 29:22, for [[שׂים בְּ]]);—Is 38:13 v. I. [[שׁוה]];—Impf. = make, produce, 3 ms. [[פְּרִי יְשַׁוֶּה לוֹ]] Ho 10:1 (Israel as vine), si vera l., v. We Now (‖[[עשׂת פְּרִי ]] Ho 9:16, cf. Ho 8:7).
